p: In a procedure analogous to Example 125, 0.64 g of the title compound was prepared from 0.39 mL (4.94 mmol) of 2-methoxyethanol, 0.24 g (6.11 mmol) of a 60% mineral oil dispersion of sodium hydride, and 0.75 g (4.7 mmol) of 3,4-difluoronitrobenzene as a light yellow solid. 1H NMR (CDCl 3, 400 MHz) δ 3.44 (s, 3H), 3.80 (d, 2H, J = 4.6 Hz), 4.28 (t, 2H, J = 4.6 Hz), 7.05 (dd, 1H, J = 8.4 and 8.4 Hz), 7.98 (dd, 1H, J = 10.6 and 2.7 Hz), and 8.03 (d, 1H, J = 9.0 Hz).
